Message:
Once we’d overcome
the seven trials set out by
our angel lord Samyaza,
we were finally able to
set out on our journey.

I’d been dreaming of this day
ever since I could remember!

I mean, a journey with
the family I love was just
bound to be fun, right?

Artoria did yell at me, saying,
“Do not forget we are doing this
to save the world, Morgana!”

But, I was just
so excited, y’know?!
I was about to set off on
a journey to never before seen
worlds together with
all of my very best friends!

There was no way
I could contain myself!

The first time we opened
a “door” and set foot into
the light on the other side...

I still remember my heart
pounding so hard
I thought it’d burst!

And so began our long,
long journey to save the world.
